languages.text: Благодаря покровительству династии фон Валанциус церкви святого Друза удалось расширить влияние в Просторе. В их тени культы иных святых теряли популярность, и суровый выбор вставал перед ними — кануть в небытие или присягнуть на верность идеалам Друза-Воина.

Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Cult of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence across the Expanse. Overshadowed, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.
languages.original_text: Благодаря покровительству династии фон Валанциус церкви святого Друза удалось расширить влияние в Просторе. В их тени культы иных святых теряли популярность, и суровый выбор вставал перед ними — кануть в небытие или присягнуть на верность идеалам Друза-Воина.

traits.locale_text: Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, Saint Drusus Church was successful in spreading its influence around the Expanse. In their shadow, sects of other Saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: to slip into obscurity or to swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, Saint Drusus Church was successful in spreading its influence around the Expanse. In their shadow, sects of other Saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: to slip into obscurity or to swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Church of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence around the Expanse. In their shadow, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Church of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence around the Expanse. In their shadow, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Cult of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence across the Expanse. Overshadowed, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Cult of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence across the Expanse. Overshadowed, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

languages.text: 得益于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的赞助，圣德鲁苏斯教派在科罗努斯扩区中的影响力不断扩大。在他们的阴影之下，其他圣徒教派纷纷失去了追随者，不得不进行艰难的选择：要么从此湮没无闻，要么宣誓效忠追随勇士德鲁苏斯的理想。
languages.original_text: Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Cult of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence across the Expanse. Overshadowed, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

traits.locale_text: 得益于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的赞助，圣德鲁苏斯教派在科罗努斯扩区中的影响力不断扩大。在他们的阴影之下，其他圣徒教派纷纷失去了追随者，不得不进行艰难的选择：要么从此湮没无闻，要么宣誓效忠追随勇士德鲁苏斯的理想。

languages.text: Dank der Gunst der Dynastie derer von Valancius konnte der Kult des Heiligen Drusus seinen Einfluss auf die gesamte Ausdehnung ausweiten. In ihrem Schatten verloren die Kulte anderer Heiliger ihre Anhänger und standen vor einer schwierigen Wahl: in Vergessenheit geraten oder den Idealen von Drusus dem Krieger die Treue schwören.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Cult of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence across the Expanse. Overshadowed, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

traits.locale_text: Dank der Gunst der Dynastie derer von Valancius konnte die Kirche des Heiligen Drusus ihren Einfluss auf die gesamte Ausdehnung ausweiten. In ihrem Schatten verloren die Kulte anderer Heiliger ihre Anhänger und standen vor einer schwierigen Wahl: in Vergessenheit geraten oder den Idealen von Drusus dem Krieger die Treue schwören.

languages.text: Grâce au soutien de la dynastie von Valancius, le Culte de Saint Drusus réussit à étendre son influence à travers les Étendues. Dans son ombre, les cultes d'autres saints perdirent leurs disciples et firent face à un choix difficile : sombrer dans l'obscurité ou embrasser les idéaux de Drusus le Guerrier.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Cult of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence across the Expanse. Overshadowed, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

traits.locale_text: Grâce au soutien de la dynastie von Valancius, l'Église de Saint Drusus réussit à étendre son influence dans l’ensemble des Étendues. Dans son ombre, les cultes d’autres saints perdirent leurs disciples et firent face à un choix difficile : sombrer dans l’obscurité ou embrasser les idéaux de Drusus le Guerrier.

languages.text: Gracias al apoyo de la dinastía von Valancius, el Culto de San Drusus consiguió llevar su influencia a toda la Extensión. Bajo su sombra, los cultos a los demás santos perdieron a sus seguidores y tuvieron que tomar una difícil decisión: caer en el olvido o sumarse a los ideales de Drusus el Guerrero.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Cult of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence across the Expanse. Overshadowed, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

traits.locale_text: Gracias al apoyo de la dinastía von Valancius, la Iglesia de San Drusus consiguió llevar su influencia a toda la Extensión. Bajo su sombra, los cultos a los demás santos perdieron a sus seguidores y tuvieron que tomar una difícil decisión: caer en el olvido o sumarse a los ideales de Drusus el Guerrero.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝による庇護のおかげで、聖ドルスス教団はエクスパンス一帯へと勢力を広げることに成功した。その影で、他の聖人たちの教団は信者を失い、忘れ去られる道を選ぶか、戦士ドラサスの理想に忠誠を誓う道を選ぶかという厳しい選択を迫られた。
languages.original_text: Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Cult of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence across the Expanse. Overshadowed, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝による庇護のおかげで、聖ドルスス教団はエクスパンス一帯へと勢力を広げることに成功した。その影で、他の聖人たちの教団は信者を失い、忘れ去られる道を選ぶか、戦士ドラサスの理想に忠誠を誓う道を選ぶかという厳しい選択を迫られた。

languages.text: Aziz Drusus Tarikatı, von Valancius hanedanlığının desteğiyle nüfuzunu Enginlik'in dört bir yanına yaydı. Onların gölgesinde kalıp takipçi kaybeden diğer azizlerin tarikatları, yok olmak ve Savaşçı Drusus'un ideallerine bağlılık yemini etmek arasında kalıp zor bir seçim yapmaya mahkûm edildi.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the patronage of the von Valancius dynasty, the Cult of Saint Drusus was successful in spreading its influence across the Expanse. Overshadowed, the cults of other saints lost their followers and faced a harsh choice: slip into obscurity or swear allegiance to the ideals of Drusus the Warrior.

traits.locale_text: Aziz Drusus Tarikatı, von Valancius hanedanlığının desteği sayesinde nüfuzunu Enginlik boyunca başarıyla yaydı. Onların gölgesinde kalan diğer azizlerin tarikatları takipçi kaybetti ve zor bir seçimle karşı karşıya kaldı: Yok olmak veya Savaşçı Drusus'un ideallerine bağlılık yemini etmek.
